content: करभः [कृ-अभच् <ls>Uṇ. 3. 122</ls>; करे भाति, भा-क <ls>Tv.</ls>] {@--1@} The back of the hand from the wrist to the root of the fingers; metacarpus; as in करभोरूः <ls>R. 6. 83</ls>; see करभोरू below. {@--2@} The trunk of an elephant. {@--3@} A young elephant. {@--4@} A young camel; <ls>Śi. 5. 3.</ls> {@--5@} A camel in general. {@--6@} A kind of perfume. --भी A shecamel.
